questions.questionTitle: How well did this person communicate with the rest of the team?

option_1.description: The person did not follow up regularly and often demonstrated unclear or inconsistent communication.

option_2.description: The person was mostly consistent but was sometimes unclear in a way that slowed down the team or created frustration.

option_3.description: The person overall contributed positively in terms of communication.

option_4.description: The person demonstrated clear and timely communication very consistently.
